charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1101_0100_2:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] noticed
Lucian and Acerola talking about something.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_0200_1: I’ll try to get it back to you as soon as possible.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_0300_1: Oh, it’s no problem! Take your time!
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_0400_1: No, that wouldn’t be right. Hmm... What to do...
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_0900_1:
Acerola has lent me a compilation of legends and
folklore from the Alola region.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_1000_1:
But since I’ve only just arrived on Pasio, I’m so
busy that I don’t think I’ll have much time to read.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_1100_1:
It’s a very precious book, so I really shouldn’t keep
it for too long...
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_1200_1: You really don’t need to worry about it!
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_1300_1: That’s very kind of you to say...
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_1400_1:
I really am looking forward to reading the book.
I would like to start it soon.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_1500_1:
That being said, I can’t neglect my training to
prepare for battling here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_1600_1:
It’s times like this that make me a bit envious
of Girafarig.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_0401_1800_1: The answer lies with Girafarig’s heads.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_2100_1:
Girafarig has two heads—a front one and a
rear one.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_2200_1:
The rear head isn’t the best thinker, but it’s very
good at battling. It also has no need for sleep.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_2300_1:
Because of that, it can keep a constant eye on its
surroundings while the front head is sleeping.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_2400_1:
Even though they share the same body! What a
strange Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_2500_1:
Indeed. Sometimes I wish that I also had two
heads: one that could stay up late reading as
much as I wish...
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_2600_1:
and one that could concentrate on battling, as a
member of the Elite Four should.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_2700_1: But of course that’s entirely unrealistic.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_2800_1:
At Sinnoh’s Pokémon League, I get my reading
done while waiting for challengers.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_2900_1:
Time is a limited resource, after all, and I try to
make good use of it.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_3000_1:
Hmm, maybe I’ll read books, too, while I’m waiting
for challengers at the League in Alola!
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_3100_1: Yes, go ahead. I recommend it.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_3300_1:
I came to return the book you lent me as
reference material!
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_3500_1:
Oh, I know! Shauntal, why don’t you have Lucian
read your book? He loves reading, too!
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_3700_1: My name’s Shauntal! I’m a novelist!
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_3800_1:
I’m working on a novel right now! Would you
mind reading it for me?
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_3900_1:
So you are an author, as I thought! Yes, of course
I’d love to read it.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_4000_1: But at this rate...even two heads won’t be enough.
charaepi_ch0176_00_goyo/2301_1201_4100_1: What would you do in this situation, Girafarig?
